abstract: Gregory D. Brenneman, the Quizno’s chief who was made chairman of the private equity firm CCMP Capital, told DealBook in an interview that the private equity industry has come full circle and now caters to experienced operators like himself and his new employer.
snippet: Gregory D. Brenneman, the Quizno’s chief who was made chairman of the private equity firm CCMP Capital, told DealBook in an interview that the private equity industry has come full circle and now caters to experienced operators like himself and hi...
lead_paragraph: Gregory D. Brenneman had spent so much of his career working with private equity firms, it seems, that it made sense to take the final step and join one.

headline.main: CCMP’s New Chairman: Private Equity Comes ‘Full Circle’
